caption.p: Distribution of effectors in IH of M. oryzae strains. (a) Fluorescence localization of the Pwl2 cytoplasmic effector in a rice sheath infected with M. oryzae. Bar = 20 μm. (b) Distribution of the apoplastic effectors Bas4 and Slp1 in wild-type and Δ Mosec61β. Bar = 20 μm. (c) Statistical analysis of the localization of the two types of fluorescent effectors in M. oryzae. Error bars represent the standard deviation
